member.name: D3D10_DEPTH_WRITE_MASK
member.summary: Identify the portion of a depth-stencil buffer for writing depth data.

member.name: D3D10_DEPTH_WRITE_MASK.D3D10_DEPTH_WRITE_MASK_ZERO
member.summary: Turn off writes to the depth-stencil buffer.

member.name: D3D10_DEPTH_WRITE_MASK.D3D10_DEPTH_WRITE_MASK_ALL
member.summary: Turn on writes to the depth-stencil buffer.
